patthana15.56:4.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.56:5.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.56:5.6: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
